name: Hushed Psychic Cleric
effectText: If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: Change it to Defense Position. Once per turn: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 Psychic monster in your GY; banish that target. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Target 1 monster banished by this card's effect; Special Summon that target.
